ape buduhamuduruwanta thawath nyana sambharayak athulu ashta pariwaththa adhi dewa gnyanaya pawa thibu bawa sandahan wenawa.me nisayi, budu radun harunu kota sruddhimathun athara aga thanpath mugalan maha rahathan wahanse saha dibbachakkhu nyanalabhingen agathanpath anuruddha maharahathan wahanse wani maha rahathan wahanse kihipa namak pamanak dew, bambaun samaga samipawa katayuthu kara thibenne.ese nam buduradunge maha nyana sambharaya suwasu dahasak dharmaskandhayakata sima wune ayi?pansalis (hathalis pas) wasarak thula winaya pitakaya 21, 000 k, suthra pitakaya 21, 000 k ha abhidharma pitakaya 42, 000 k washayen oba kiyapu paridi suwasu (84,000) dahasaka dharmaskandhayak deshana kota wadara thibenawa.
